title: Extended Project-Based Education Program for Promoting Self-Directed Independent Learning in Science

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theories in the field of science and practical experience
context.additional_context: Targeting current practitioners, conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment, with learners leading the entire process from research topic selection to report writing and presentation

learning_goals: Learners can independently select project topics and write proposals to solve practical problems in a given scientific field
Learners can collect and organize at least three reliable reference materials within two weeks using smartphone-based information search and management tools
By the end of the 4-week course, learners can write a 10-page A4 report and create a 10-minute presentation on independent project outcomes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
